titles.title: Celebrate, Celebrate The Glory Of Our God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Celebrate, Celebrate The glory of our God.
Celebrate, celebrate His wisdom and His power.
He has given to us the victory.
Celebrate the glory of our God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is fullness of joy,
In His presence, in His presence,
There is fullness of joy.
Joy in the presence of our God.
